| History                 = Coven Akkaba is a group of magic practictioners that boast descent from the original settlement of [[Akkaba (Egypt)|Akkaba]], birthplace of [[En Sabah Nur (Earth-616)|Apocalypse]]. Unlike [[Clan Akkaba (Earth-616)|Clan Akkaba]], descendants of Apocalypse, Coven Akkaba is formed by baseline humans who boast descent from those who cast out Apocalypse after his birth.
